title: BRIEF-HNI Reports Q1 GAAP EPS Of $0.06
text:
April 20, 2018 / 8:34 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-HNI Reports Q1 GAAP EPS Of $0.06 Reuters Staff 
April 20 (Reuters) - HNI Corp: 
* REPORTS STRONG SALES GROWTH FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 TO $0.38 EXCLUDING ITEMS 
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 
* Q1 SALES $505.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $495.3 MILLION 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.40 TO $2.70 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES Q2 SALES UP 1 TO 4 PERCENT 
* CORPORATION CONTINUES TO EXPECT FULL YEAR 2018 ORGANIC SALES TO BE UP 5 TO 8 PERCENT 
* SEES Q2 ORGANIC SALES TO BE UP 4 TO 7 PERCENT COMPARED TO SAME QUARTER LAST YEAR 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.54, REVENUE VIEW $2.24 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
